moveHorizontally(int, int, int, int) - Method in class com.example.demo.game.GameScene
Compares two tile's values together and if they are the same or if one is equal to 0 (plain tile) - their values are added (provided that the tiles we are comparing are two different tiles and they are moving towards the appropriate direction) - Uses recursion to go through the entire column
moveLeft() - Method in class com.example.demo.game.GameScene
